headline: Campbell’s Says Executive Accused of Racist and Disparaging Comments Has Left Company
summary: Campbell’s confirmed the executive’s departure, and called the alleged comments “vulgar, offensive and false.”

headline: Campbell’s fires exec after leaked recording berating ‘poor’ customers and ‘bioengineered meat’ prompts outrage and investigation
summary: The comments were caught on a recording by a now-former employee.

headline: Campbell’s Fires Executive Behind Recording That Disparaged Its Food
summary: The IT executive allegedly caught on audio made racist comments about Indian co-workers and said Campbell’s made “highly processed food” for “poor people.”

raw.headline: Campbell’s Fires Executive Behind Recording That Disparaged Its Food
raw.summary: The IT executive allegedly caught on audio made racist comments about Indian co-workers and said Campbell’s made “highly processed food” for “poor people.”

headline: Campbell's responds to exec. lawsuit, Petco raises outlook
summary: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman outlines what's driving investor interest in three of the top trending tickers on Yahoo Finance's platform, including Campbell's (CPB), Scripps (SSP), and Petco (WOOF). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Wall Street Lunch: Early Deals And Generative AI Push Holiday Spending To Nearly $80B
summary: Consumers have already spent about $79.7 billion online this holiday season. Adobe says the early holiday spending is up about 7.5% from last year's pace.

headline: Campbell’s Defends Its Ingredients After Chicken Controversy
summary: The company said it placed an executive on temporary leave after he was allegedly caught on tape saying the company made “highly processed food” for “poor people.”
